title: Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.11 - 11/06/15
body:
Summoners,

On 11/06/15, starting at 02:30 Sydney Time (16:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.11. At 04:00 Sydney Time (18:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded.

We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for up to 6 hours. You can check out the patch notes here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-511-notes

-Riot Cochese

replies.body:
Sorry for the late response Chemmy. Can you run this: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/tools/network-logs

Once you have that info, please send it to ocelivereports@riotgames.com

Also:

* What city do you live in?
* What ISP provider do you use?
* What kind of ping are you seeing when you get spikes? What is normal for you?
I've got some angry lag spikes on 11-13, dcing occassionally too. Could it be due to Vodafone issues or there's a chance the server goes mad?
The patch is live and you will begin downloading it when you log in. GL;HF
